attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So called safety cameras on our roads are not always placed fairly, as can be seen in the following link.  They can have the opposite effect to safety by causing people to be on edge whilst driving, always having to be checking speed rather than consentrating on good safe driving.

rejection.details: You might also want to remove the reference to the link which you have removed.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
